about_the_game:
The future of the planet depends on a small seed – and its name is Looppip.

You control Looppip, a magical seed that carries an ancient hourglass with the power to turn back time. Your mission is to save the bee hives, essential for the survival of life on Earth, and reverse the environmental collapse threatening nature.

Journeying through four worlds devastated by degrading forces, you will face:

  • First World: Wildfires consuming vital habitats.

  • Second World: Pollution poisoning the air and water.

  • Third World: Aggressive industrialization suffocating nature.

  • Fourth World: Robots and artificial intelligence that disregard ecological balance.

Looppip has a unique power: by manipulating time, he can go back 3 seconds into the past, allowing him to escape traps, correct mistakes, and solve challenging puzzles. With his hourglass, every second counts as you fight to protect the bees, fundamental to ecological balance.

Can Looppip reverse the course of time and save the future? In Looppip, each turn back in time is a chance to restore nature.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-core de 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Placa integrada ou GPU com 512 MB de VRAM (como Intel HD Graphics)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Quad-core de 2.5 GHz ou superior
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU dedicada com 1 GB de VRAM (como NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 ou equivalente)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
